column2: a.m.|You are four minutes too slow. No matter; it's enough to mention the error. Now from this moment

column1: 1129|minute short of 11:30|It was still a minute short of 11:30. He would make time to visit the monuments in St. George's church in Bradwell
column2: but after that brief visit there would be no possible excuse for not driving back to London to lunch at New Scotland Yard.
